question: I have read in a book that if there is an outstanding debt of R120,000 on a house worth R120,000 the entire amount is exempt from Zakaat. Is that correct?
answer:
QUESTION
If that is the case, one will not pay Zakaat for many years.
ANSWER


Share:
The ruling contained in that book is incorrect. Only the amount that is
due for one year will be regarded as a liability. (Shaami vol.3 pg.177;
Lebanon)

From: Al Mahmood 13 Q & A from the Darul Ifta
Mufti Ebrahim Desai
